About

JIN is a leading cross-cultural entertainment agency focusing on celebrity promotion to lead market entry, brand marketing campaigns, entertainmnent sponsorship for elite brands. We offer higher level of access to celebrities in the world to provide strategic, customized entertainment solutions throughout advertising, events, licensing, goodwill and corporate branding.

Emotions are the most precious currencies of brands. We believe that if brands can find a way to stimulate peopleâ€™s emotions connecting with certain celebrities, story telling they can clarify their brand identity and maximize the brand value.

With 3 offices (in Beijing, Shanghai, and Hong Kong) and a smart dedicated bilingual staff, JIN provides world-class support to all types and sizes of international entertainment solutions.
